SELECT * FROM tb_bm_1000mt
AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND BOM_CD= #{bom_cd}
AND UPPER(BOM_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{key}) || '%'
AND BOM_NM LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%'
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
SELECT A.* FROM TB_MD_1000MT A, TB_BM_1000MT B WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.MT_MNG_CD = B.BOM_CD(+) AND B.BOM_CD IS NULL AND A.MT_MNG_CD LIKE 'B%'
SELECT A.* FROM TB_MD_1000MT A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.MT_MNG_CD LIKE 'M%'
select b.mr_nm , b.amnt_qunt , b.unt_nm , b.sn from tb_bm_1000mt a , tb_ad_1000mt b where 1=1 and a.bom_cd = b.bom_cd and a.bom_cd = #{bom_cd} ORDER BY B.SN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_AD_1000MT (SN, BOM_CD, MR_NM, AMNT_QUNT, UNT_NM) VALUES ( SQ_TB_AD_1000MT_SN.NEXTVAL, #{bom_cd}, #{alpha}, #{amount}, #{gram} )
mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_AD_1000MT tgt USING ( SELECT #{bom_cd} AS BOM_CD, #{amount} AS AMNT_QUNT, #{alpha} as MR_NM, nvl(#{sn},0) as SN FROM dual ) src ON (tgt.BOM_CD = src.BOM_CD AND tgt.SN = src.SN) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tgt.AMNT_QUNT = src.AMNT_QUNT, tgt.MR_NM = src.MR_NM WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (BOM_CD, MR_NM, AMNT_QUNT, UNT_NM, SN) VALUES (src.BOM_CD, src.MR_NM, src.AMNT_QUNT,'g',SQ_TB_AD_1000MT_SN.NEXTVAL)
